Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: There was just a lot of comedy on the TV in the house, and my parents are both very funny

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Jared Hess' movies. He's such a weirdo and such a nice, funny guy

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like playing unique characters that I love

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: What's not to love about a crazy cat lady? You have to be very giving to be a crazy cat lady

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing makes me laugh more than farting

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I have a favorite color

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope we will be able to have a happy family ourselves

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, the people around home are very supportive to us

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still very much Kate

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I had the Levis guy on my wall, not a picture of William, sorry

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no one quite like William - I bet he's really kind. You can just tell by looking at him

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I find doing speeches nerve wrecking

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: We want to encourage people to talk to one another

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: No parent would fail to call the doctor if their child developed a fever

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I often get asked why I decided to spend time highlighting the mental health of children

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to the gym wouldn't be on my list of favorite things to do

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: It was kind of boring for me to have to eat. I would know that I had to, and I would

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: What people say isn't going to stop me. I have to do things for myself

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I'm being blamed not only for anorexia but for lung cancer. - On being a social smoker

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a sin to be tired

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors do like watching girls parade down the runway for some reason

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about the blanket. Blanket, pillow, and red wine. You should always be asleep on a plane

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't hear me talk. They don't expect me to

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: It is quite amazing what I didn't feel after a while. I didn't really want to feel things

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream was always to be on the cover of 'Sports Illustrated.'

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: So, I have my own horse and two ponies. I grew up around horses, and that really is my passion

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think twerking is overrated

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a paralyzing fear of snakes

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never find the right bras

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate exercising self-control

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be able to sing well, but I have the worst voice in the world

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think that pick-up lines in general are horrible. None of them work

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to think hard with a tattoo. 'What will I love for the rest of my life?'

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved fashion, but it's not what I set out to do

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: I think heartbreak is something that you learn to live with as opposed to learn to forget

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very easy to be judgmental until you know someone's truth

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: The good and bad things are what form us as people... change makes us grow

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe in, 'Move on, live and let live, forgive and forget.'

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have impossibly high standards

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: Glamour to me is about remaining graceful and understated

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: I burp, I fart. I'm a real woman

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short, and it is here to be lived

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: There's more to life than cheek bones

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: Loving someone is setting them free, letting them go

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: It's weird to me to see how different everyone's opinion of beauty is

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I get recognized so much. It happens mostly when I'm in Starbucks

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad always said that hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard enough

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you're doing good work, you don't necessarily need to be validated

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear high heels and dresses. I am a total girly girl

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody can't complain when they enjoy going to work and enjoy the people they work with

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't realize that I started in musical theater. That's where my roots are

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up watching science fiction and action movies. I love it. I absolutely love it!

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the craziest people I've met, in my life, are some of the most brilliant people I've met

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate horror movies, with a passion

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: There isn't a lot written about the motorcycle culture

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: Each time I seem to go through one of life's huge things, I want to play music

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I've certainly experienced physical pain in my life

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mother has been my greatest teacher and also the most self-sacrificing thing I've ever done

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never loved anybody the way I love my children

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like sort of disappearing

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very rebellious

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, we travelled a lot when I was a kid because my father was wherever the work was

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is extremely intuitive, which acting too in a different way

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty emotional person

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is hard. After all, it kills you

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Without discipline, there's no life at all

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is the most minor of gifts. After all, Shirley Temple could do it when she was four

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you always do what interests you, at least one person is pleased

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you obey all the rules you miss all the fun

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never realized until lately that women were supposed to be the inferior sex

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never lose sight of the fact that just being is fun

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Death will be a great relief. No more interviews

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Enemies are so stimulating

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Never complain. Never explain

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Every doorway, every intersection has a story

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's just say, the American school of suburban angst is not my cup of tea

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Prior to penicillin and medical research, death was an everyday occurrence. It was intimate

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a family of great readers and storytellers

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: But I went to high school in a Portland suburb and went to college here

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that it's really important to go away and come back

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Asked why they wanted to fight, the young women said they enjoyed it, just as some men and boys do

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: But the idea that women can't take care of themselves still permeates our culture

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: There should be unemployment insurance for fictional people

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: A boxing gym is a place where men are allowed to be kind to one another

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most uncoordinated clumsy, klutzy person. I always had a bruise, I always tripped and fell

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: My good friends are Mormon, some of the best people I know

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: A girl told me my lips looked like somebody had pressed strawberry yogurt against my face

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys are kind of retarded until they're about 30

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: It's more fun to think that there are other worlds

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer a kiss that is so much more than just a tongue in your mouth

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to be taken advantage of if you're not honest

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm terrible with patience

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is a great source of advice and wisdom and consolation for me

Quote.Author: Katherine Heigl
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to stay in the moment and enjoy the great things that are happening

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: When I dance, I forget everything else and just feel completely happy

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a question on 'The Weakest Link,' that was quite a moment

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is one of the sexiest things

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a perfectionist

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn your lessons from the mistakes you make, not the things you achieve

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I love coming back to Neath - this is home and always will be

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I was such a geek in school

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing a mixture of everything from opera, folk music, Broadway. It's a mix of things

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Marilyn Monroe was supposedly a size 16, which is probably why I love her style; it suits me better

Quote.Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote.QuoteValue: If my mum thinks I'm acting like a diva she'll soon tell me off... She'll cut me down to size!

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: The RSC changed my career, and 'Coronation Street' changed my life

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my first memories is running up and down the theatre at Wakefield Opera House

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite happy being single

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I take one day at a time. I've always been like that

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I agree with my mother that having children removes a layer of skin that you never grow back

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to be brave

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: You should see the way I walk around on the way to the nursery. I look a state

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming a mother has turned my world upside down, but in a really good way - it's the best

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: As for getting married, I don't have strong feelings, really - I can take or leave it

Quote.Author: Katherine Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no sort of hierarchy at 'Corrie.' The crew get on

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: Love in the real world means saying you're sorry 10 times a day

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: Our culture is in moral chaos. On TV we celebrate freaks instead of honest, decent people

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: To this day I do not believe I'm great at anything

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexual harassment is complex, subtle, and highly subjective

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: We're imperfect people trapped in an imperfect world until we get to that place beyond

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: We heard stories about fakery and decoys at revivals. I never personally saw any trickery

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no secret that I love to talk, but the real secret is I love to listen, too

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: I was told all my life I was part Cherokee. Then it was Crow. The latest is Blackfoot

Quote.Author: Kathie Lee Gifford
Quote.QuoteValue: God didn't bless me with success so I could eat caviar every day

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: There's just as many different kinds of feminism as there are women in the world

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: Art revolves around creating something that isn't there

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make something that I wanted to hear that I wasn't hearing

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanna be a legend; I wanna be a cult hero. I do!

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: Popularity is totally overrated

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: Singing is my life, and I have to do it, or I'm going to go totally bananas

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: What happens tomorrow is going to happen tomorrow

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like to talk about my work in a way that is complicated

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: I think as a culture, we don't like conflict or looking at icky stuff - especially in our downtime

Quote.Author: Kathleen Hanna
Quote.QuoteValue: I think music can definitely be art; I also think music can be crap and not be art

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of good government is trust

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mother is no longer a liability, and being a woman is no longer a pre-existing condition!

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: In many ways, human health is the great global connector

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how tough it is to stand up to powerful forces that prey on consumers

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: A healthy state encourages many voices - and lots of listening

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe we all agree that, for the health of Kansas, nothing is more important than education

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: General Motors spends more on health care than steel

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I was governor of Kansas when Mitt Romney was governor of Massachusetts

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Insurance companies can no longer refuse to cover Americans with pre-existing conditions

Quote.Author: Kathleen Sebelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent my career fighting the worst practices of insurance companies

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the less I suffer fools gladly

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman can plan when to have her family and how to support a family

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I find the idea of today's icons being teenagers incredibly uninspiring

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: The big gap between the ability of actors is confidence

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: Get more women producers, writers, directors. Why should we expect men to do it for us? They can't

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not admire young actresses whose foreheads cannot move

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a New York snob

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are responsible for creating their own roles

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I am certainly a liberal

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no desire to play most of the roles being offered

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: I thrive on production. It feels very much like a natural environment for me

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be made pacified or made comfortable. I like stuff that gets your adrenaline going

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps the only thing in my favor is that I am very tenacious. I don't take 'no' very well

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: The urge to purge the material I come up with is, I guess, an ongoing process

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: Something becomes personal when it deviates from the norm

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm drawn to filmmaking that can transport me. Film can immerse you, put you there

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: I think violence in a cinematic context can be, if handled in a certain way, very seductive

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be strong

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema has the capacity to be so physiological

Quote.Author: Kathryn Bigelow
Quote.QuoteValue: Character and emotionality don't always have to be relegated to quieter, more simple constructs

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you see me on Friday, you'll see different material on Saturday night

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: That's life when you're on the D-list

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: Gwyneth Paltrow names her kid Apple. I'm not going to let that stand

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: Have I gone too far?

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: So I wonder if anything should ever be off limits

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: So yes, I say things I regret constantly, and I just can't help it

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I love Montreal... I think I love Montreal more than Montreal loves me... I love the food there

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: My act is based on my life

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: I also love Mole, the unsung hero of reality programming

Quote.Author: Kathy Griffin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a Celebrity Survivor would be great

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I belonged on the other side of the lens

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty comes from the inside

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say my sense of adventure outweighs my grace

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't just work for the money; that will bring only limited satisfaction

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: But I look at failure as education. In that respect, I am so well-educated

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: Our mission began with finding solutions for families, especially busy moms

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm too much of a control freak

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be healthy, to be there for my husband and my kids

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a curious person. I like to ask questions

Quote.Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't give up my day job of design

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to thank everyone for all their support and prayers. I'm so humbled by that

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every fight is a tough fight, but I'm not settling for a bronze medal

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all sorts of food, chocolate especially. I eat well, but I like the odd Chinese, like anyone!

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: You're clearing your mind during a workout. Boxing is a great sport for girls; it's really safe

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to leave a great legacy behind me and continue to win major championships

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really change much; there's not much I can do about the judging in front of a home crowd

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a good job of staying positive and just moving on

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Mental strength is something you either have or you haven't

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything other than a gold medal will be disappointing

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just sorry I couldn't come home with a second Olympic gold medal

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: Dance has been a big passion for me

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: Love should be all about giving and trusting

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in destiny, God's hand and hard work

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, physical beauty is never the reason for attraction to anyone

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: I will give my life to whoever in need, to any dear friend of mine

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody would be an actor if he/she were not charming at some level

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe there is any point in holding on to too many things in life

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to do an action film like Angelina Jolie's 'Salt.'

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: You can try to plan your career, but not marriage

Quote.Author: Katrina Kaif
Quote.QuoteValue: Luck and being honest and sincere about work has worked for me and helped me reach where I am

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's great to dress up and play on all the girly features

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm every woman. It takes a village to make me who I am

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy, I'm in a good place, I'm looking forward to my future

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: My personality is up and down, sassy and cheeky

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need the Prince Charming to have my own happy ending

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I fall in love every time. And I don't really fall in love a lot, but when I do, I fall hard

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't have a childhood

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a very non-accepting family, but I'm very accepting

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to bring attention to myself. I don't like to make a scene

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always liked home-cooked meals

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not out here just for the money. I want to be a great player

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh man, I like Chevys

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never trying to break a career high out there

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always trying to come down with a win. That's what matters to me and my squad

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is motivation

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a low-key guy

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm away from basketball, I hang out with my friends, chill, and that's about it

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I just have to move forward and keep working on my game and getting better

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad was a workaholic. I saw him work seven days a week

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: Saying you're from Texas makes you kind of proud

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: The traditional role of the Senate has been to be the adult in the room

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to thank the people of Texas for asking me to represent them in Washington

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been able to rise above the expectations

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: Congress can't take the year off, election or no election

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a moderate. I am a conservative. I'm a fix-it conservative

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot afford to lose the Medicaid funding for low-income women

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have long believed taxpayers make better use of their money than the government ever could

Quote.Author: Kay Bailey Hutchison
Quote.QuoteValue: Texans should not be taxed on our taxes

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Moods are complicated and very much a part of who we are. People would be very boring without them

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: We expect well-informed treatment for cancer or heart disease; it matters no less for depression

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidentiality is an ancient and well-warranted social value

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: With grief, you have reason to despair; it's a human thing

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief comes and goes, but depression is unremitting

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing good comes out of depression

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is marvelous, but wisdom is even better

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: I say I'm an academic: a professor of psychiatry at Johns Hopkins. And I write

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: 'An Unquiet Mind' wasn't hard to write in terms of the actual writing of it

Quote.Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote.QuoteValue: Scientists have made extraordinary advances in understanding the brain and its disorders

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: All children have to be deceived if they are to grow up without trauma

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: Now when I look back to the Guildford of that time, it seems far more exotic to me than Nagasaki

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is crawling with authors touring now. They're like performance artists

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: People were incredibly kind to our family and went out of their way to help
